variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC.
variable.comment: For category 1, Health research: studies to learn about, prevent or treat health problems. For category 3, Limited to health research on dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. This includes research to improve methods for conducting research that could be applied to dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. For example, studies of conditions like cataract, diabetes, and psoriasis might be appropriate, while conditions like attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and neuroblastoma might not be appropriate. Studies of conditions that are common in both children and the elderly, such as schizophrenia or depression, would not be appropriate if they focused on children and young adults. Studies focused primarily on pediatric populations are not permitted.
variable.value: Health Research - Group Health Seattle: These data will be used only for health related research, including research to improve methods for health related research.

Dementia or Aging - Group Health Seattle: Limited to health research on dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. This includes research to improve methods for conducting research that could be applied to dementia or other adult conditions related to the aging process. For example, studies of conditions like cataract, diabetes, and psoriasis might be appropriate, while conditions like attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and neuroblastoma might not be appropriate. Studies of conditions that are common in both children and the elderly, such as schizophrenia or depression, would not be appropriate if they focused on children or young adults. Studies focused primarily on pediatric populations are not permitted.
Health Research - Marshfield Clinic:May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems. No Permitted Use: Insurance companies.
Health Research - Vanderbilt U: May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems.

Health Research - Mayo Clinic: Mayo Clinic Data may only be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems. Investigators must state in the Data Use Request their intention to publish or otherwise broadly share any findings from his or her study with the scientific community.
Health Research - Northwestern U: May be used for genetic studies to learn about, prevent, or treat health problems. No Permitted Use: Insurance companies.

variable.name: SOURCE_SUBJID
variable.description: Subject ID used in the Source Repository.
